title: Explore
description: This app includes example code to help you get started.

fileRouting.title: File-based routing
fileRouting.text1: This app has two screens: {{screen1}} and {{screen2}}
fileRouting.text2: The layout file in {{layoutFile}} sets up the tab navigator.

platformSupport.title: Android, iOS, and web support
platformSupport.text: You can open this project on Android, iOS, and the web. To open the web version, press {{key}} in the terminal running this project.

images.title: Images
images.text: For static images, you can use the {{density2x}} and {{density3x}} suffixes to provide files for different screen densities

customFonts.title: Custom fonts
customFonts.text: Open {{layoutFile}} to see how to load {{example}}
customFonts.example: custom fonts such as this one.

themes.title: Light and dark mode components
themes.text: This template has light and dark mode support. The {{hook}} hook lets you inspect what the user's current color scheme is, and so you can adjust UI colors accordingly.

animations.title: Animations
animations.text: This template includes an example of an animated component. The {{component}} component uses the powerful {{library}} library to create a waving hand animation.
animations.iosText: The {{component}} component provides a parallax effect for the header image.
